projects.title: Better Chat Ranks
projects.description: add Customizable player ranks that appear in chat messages and next to player names. Perfect for servers, the ranks help distinguish roles like Admin, Mod, or VIP directly in chat!

projects.title: Shop GUI
projects.description: Sell your item anywhere by simply typing command

projects.title: Toggle Night Vision
projects.description: Minecraft Addon that allows player to toggle night vision effect by simply typing `/nvision` command

projects.title: Easy Perspective
projects.description: Change camera perspective using simple command

projects.title: Better Spectator
projects.description: Spectate players and monitor what they are doing and can also change the camera angle for better view.

projects.title: Telebot
projects.description: Automated telegram bot lets you build and customized telegram bots for free. No coding required
